import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import './CreateGroup.css'; import sparkling from './sparkling.js'; function CreateGroup(){ const groupFile = useRef(); const groupImg = useRef(); const imgPath = useRef(); const imgCircle = useRef(); const imgText = useRef(); const imgSelect = (e) => { groupFile.current.click(); imgPath.current.style.fill = '#fff'; imgCircle.current.style.fill = '#fff'; imgText.current.style.fill = '#fff'; }; const imgChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); let reader = new FileReader(); let file = event.target.files[0]; reader.onloadend = (c) => { groupImg.current.style.backgroundImage = `url(${c.target.result})`; } reader.readAsDataURL(file); }; return(
